      • makeDelegatedTask

        public DelegatedTask makeDelegatedTask(java.lang.String description,
                              int estimatedDuration,
                              int acceptableDeviation,
                              java.util.Map<ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> resourceTypes,
                              boolean dependenciesFinished,
                              int developerAmount)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Will make a delegated task with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        description - The description for the delegated task to be made
        estimatedDuration - The estimated duration for the delegated task to be made
        acceptableDeviation - The acceptable deviation for the delegated task to be made
        resourceTypes - The resource types for the delegated task to be made
        dependenciesFinished - A boolean indicating whether the dependencies are finished for the delegated task to be made
        developerAmount - An integer indicating the amount of developers needed for the delegated task to be made
        Returns:
        returns the constructed delegated task
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] Will throw an exception incase one of the given parameters is illegal
